name: Ringring Candy Pop: Sweet Morning Happy Match Puzzle Game
name_original: Ringring Candy Pop: Sweet Morning Happy Match Puzzle Game
description:
It's time to take your puzzle solving and detective skills to the limit in this unique Ringring Candy Pop game!

In Ringring Candy Pop, you need switch and match three or more candies to collect them to pass the levels. With all the cute candies and interesting game modes, more and more new things will introduced. You will get a totally fresh new experience. Come on, let's continue the fantastic journey and get the most fun out of the adventure!

Test your matching skills in this exciting, ultra addictive candy gem matching game, featuring multiple fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along,

KEY FEATURES
- Embark on an epic 2016 across a transforming landscape - change the world!
- Over 300 levels, with unique game modes, and puzzling obstacles
- Beautiful papercraft inspired eye candy with radiant environments and animation
- Crush those tacky monsters with sweet power-ups
- Connect with friends to help each other out and compete for the high score
- A casual game that's easy to learn, but hard to win!

Ringring Candy Pop is completely free, very fun and interesting, quickly join this game!
